message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You wanted 60-40, I'll give you 55-45, let's meet in the middle!
I'll meet you halfway, let's try 45-55 this time!
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better. 50-50 is my next offer!
I'll give you a slight edge, let's try 40-60 this time!
I'm still not convinced, but I'll meet you at 42-58. Let's see if we can make a deal!
